Instruction: 'Cook the frozen peas according to the package instructions.'
'Drain the cooked peas and rinse them under cold water.'
'Finely chop the fresh mint leaves and red onion.'
In a large bowl, combine the cooked peas, chopped mint leaves, and chopped red onion.'
'Drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over the salad.'
'Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.'
